XinxAction::MenuItem

XinxAction::MenuItem Class Reference

This class menu item used in a menu list. Class represent a menu item. A menu item can be an action or a separator. This used by plugin, for define which type of item the element is. More...

#include <actioninterface.h>

Detailed Description

This class menu item used in a menu list. Class represent a menu item. A menu item can be an action or a separator. This used by plugin, for define which type of item the element is.
